benchmark_details.name: CodeApex: A Bilingual Programming Evaluation Benchmark for Large Language Models
benchmark_details.overview: CodeApex is a bilingual benchmark dataset focusing on the programming comprehension, code generation, and code correction abilities of Large Language Models (LLMs).

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive evaluation of the programming capabilities of LLMs.

data.source: Derived from real-world programming exercises submitted by students.
data.size: 250 multiple-choice questions, 476 coding questions, 1330 erroneous code segments
data.annotation: Manually created and validated by experts.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is calculated as the number of correct answers over the total number of questions.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better programming comprehension and generation abilities of LLMs.
methodology.validation: Experimental validation through cross-evaluation of multiple models on the same tasks.
